example.code:
PS C:\>Get-IAMAttachedRolePolicyList -RoleName "SecurityAuditRole"
PolicyArn PolicyName --------- ---------- arn:aws:iam::aws:policy/SecurityAudit SecurityAudit
example.description: This command returns the names and ARNs of the managed policies attached to the IAM role named SecurityAuditRole in the AWS account. To see the list of inline policies that are embedded in the role, use the Get-IAMRolePolicies command.
